## 🌟 Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you're suggesting.

## 🚀 What's the Benefit?
Describe the benefit of this feature from a user's perspective.

## 🛠️ Proposed Solution
Your proposed solution to implement this feature.

## 💡 Possible Alternatives
Alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## 🗺️ Example Scenario
An example scenario where this feature would be used.

## 📚 Any Relevant Documentation?
Links to any relevant documentation or resources that could help.

## 🌞 Anything else you would like to add?
Any other context or screenshots about the feature request.

## 🎯 What
* ❓ What changes are being made?
* 🎉 User impact?

## 🤔 Why
* 💡 Rationale behind the changes?
* 🎯 Benefits?

* 🔗 Useful links or documentation.
